title: Prepare Bacon
description: Chop and cook bacon as a substitute for guanciale, which is traditionally used in carbonara.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Bacon
original_subgoals.description: Chop and cook bacon as a substitute for guanciale, which is traditionally used in carbonara.

title: Prepare Egg Mixture
description: Separate egg yolks and mix with grated cheese to create the sauce base.

original_subgoals.description: Separate egg yolks and mix with grated cheese to create the sauce base.

title: Cook Spaghetti
description: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, ensuring it doesn't stick together.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Spaghetti
original_subgoals.description: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, ensuring it doesn't stick together.

title: Combine Ingredients
description: Demonstrate how to mix the cooked pasta with the bacon, egg, and cheese mixture. Ensure the eggs do not scramble by stirring quickly and adding reserved pasta water gradually to achieve a creamy consistency.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Mix cooked spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture, adding pasta water to achieve a creamy consistency.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Show how to combine the cooked pasta with the egg and cheese mixture, ensuring the eggs do not scramble, and achieve a creamy texture.

title: Finish and Serve
description: Finish the dish with additional cheese and pepper, and serve the pasta.

title: Introduction
description: Introduce the concept of traditional Pasta Carbonara and clarify common misconceptions about its ingredients.

title: Prepare Meat
description: Discuss the choice of meat for the dish, such as guanciale, bacon, or pancetta, and demonstrate how to prepare it for cooking.

title: Prepare Pasta Water
description: Explain how to properly season the pasta water, considering the salty elements in Carbonara.

title: Prepare Cheese
description: Introduce the types of cheese used in Carbonara, such as Pecorino Romano and Parmigiano Reggiano, and demonstrate how to grate and mix them.

title: Prepare Egg Mixture
description: Explain the composition of the egg mixture, including the use of whole eggs and yolks, and how to combine it with the cheese and seasonings.

title: Render Bacon

title: Plate and Garnish
